Run ESR shiny apps

as.ESR.Spectrum()

Coercion from and to ESR.Spectrum

calc_DePlateau()

Fit a dose response curve to ESR data and create a DE-DEmax Plot after Schellmann & Radtke (2001)

ESR-package

Collection of functions for Electron Spin Resonance Dating data analysis

find_Peaks()

A simple peak finding algorithm for ESR spectra
